patch.name: patch
patch.title: CiviCRM Patch Available
patch.message:
The site is running 5.14.1. Additional patches are available:

  • 5.14.2 (2019-06-29): Fix recent regressions involving sample data-set and dashboard activity feed (with ACLs).

upgrade.title: CiviCRM Upgrade Available
upgrade.message:

5.16.0 was released on 2019-08-07. The latest patch revision is 5.16.4 (2019-09-03).

5.18.0 was released on 2019-10-04. The latest patch revision is 5.18.4 (2019-10-22).
5.19.0 was released on 2019-11-06. The latest patch revision is 5.19.4 (2019-12-04).
5.20.0 was released on 2019-12-04. The latest patch revision is 5.20.2 (2019-12-11).
